#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>

#define printSt(str)		cout << str << endl;
#define printTwo(str,i)		cout << str << " " << i << endl;
#define print(i)		cout << i << endl;
#define scan(i) 		cin >> i;
#define lprint(a,n)		for(i=0;i<n;i++)	cout << a[i] ; // print the a 
#define lscan(a,n)		for(i=0;i<n;i++)	cin >> a[i]  // scan the enter input
#define lval(a,n,val)		for(i=0;i<n;i++)	a[i] = val;
#define loop(i,n)		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define max 200

using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,i,j;
	scan(t);
	while(t--){
		int len,no;
		scan(len);scan(no);
		int a[256];
		string str;scan(str);
		lval(a,256,0);
		loop(i,str.size())
			a[str[i]-'0']++;
		while(no--){
			string one,two;
			cin >> one >> two;
			int length = a[one[0]-'0'];
			if(two=="even"){
				if(length%2==0)
					cout << "yes " << endl;
				else
					cout << "no" << endl; 
			}else{
				if(length%2!=0)
					cout << "yes " << endl;
				else
					cout << "no" << endl;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
